alert.note: Alert for Brooks; Lanier; Lowndes; Thomas (Georgia) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Flood Advisory issued June 15 at 12:54PM EDT until June 15 at 4:00PM EDT by NWS Tallahassee
info.description: ...FLOOD ADVISORY IN EFFECT UNTIL 3 PM EDT THIS AFTERNOON... * WHAT...Flooding caused by excessive rainfall is expected. * WHERE...Portions of Big Bend Florida and south central Georgia, including the following counties, in Big Bend Florida, Jefferson, Leon and Madison. In south central Georgia, Brooks, Lanier, Lowndes and Thomas. * WHEN...Until 300 PM EDT. * IMPACTS...Minor flooding in low-lying and poor drainage areas. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 1254 PM EDT, Doppler radar indicated heavy rain due to thunderstorms. Minor flooding is ongoing or expected to begin shortly in the advisory area. Between 1.5 and 2.5 inches of rain have fallen in the last 1 Hour. - Additional rainfall amounts of 1.5 to 2.5 inches are expected over the area. This additional rain will result in minor flooding. - Some locations that will experience flooding include... Monticello, Quitman, Valdosta, Lake Park, Lakeland, Hahira, Boston, Pavo, I-75 At Exit 16, Moody Air Force Base, Remerton, Dasher, Morven, Barwick, Blue Springs, Brooks Co A/p, Nankin, Empress, Kinderlou and Dixie. - http://www.weather.gov/safety/flood
info.instruction: Turn around, don`t drown when encountering flooded roads. Most flood deaths occur in vehicles.
